kv6.4:5.3: Nibbānaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ accutaṃ amatanti?
kv6.4:6.3: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv6.4:6.5: Asaṅkhataṃ bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv6.4:8.1: Ākāsānañcāyatane sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv6.4:8.3: Asaṅkhate sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv6.4:8.6: ākāsānañcāyatane atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv6.4:8.8: Asaṅkhate atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv6.4:9.4: Nanu cattāro āruppā anejā vuttā bhagavatāti?
kv6.4:9.6: Hañci cattāro āruppā anejā vuttā bhagavatā, tena vata re vattabbe—
